sentences.en: Ah! You have been in a bad school for matrimony, in Hill Street?
sentences.cn: 啊! 你上过希尔街哪个歪门邪道的婚姻学校 吧 ?

sentences.en: He had got his neck out of the yoke of matrimony.
sentences.cn: 他已经摆脱了婚姻的枷锁.

sentences.en: I rather think that reading, like matrimony is determined by fate or yinyuaii.
sentences.cn: 我认为读书和婚姻一样,是命运注定的或阴阳注定的.

sentences.en: It isn't possible that you were so misguided as to think I would propose matrimony? "
sentences.cn: 你不会糊涂到认为我会向你求婚 吧 ?

sentences.en: Marriage is the covenant between two people, and the decision remain together in wedded matrimony.
sentences.cn: 婚姻是两个人之间的契约, 是双方同意在共同缔结的婚姻生活中相依相伴的决定.

sentences.en: Matrimony basis is the foundation on which marriage relation is established, maintained , developed and dissolved.
sentences.cn: 婚姻基础是婚姻关系建立 、 续、展、除的基本依据.

sentences.en: The language of matrimony may often be invoked to describe corporate tie - ups ; bust - ups too.
sentences.cn: 描述结婚的语言常常被拿来比喻企业的合作, 而描述分手的语言被用来比喻企业之间的关系破裂.

sentences.en: The processing technology of matrimony vine juice and healthy matrimony vine stirred yoghurt were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了枸杞浆的制取工艺,并以此为原料之一,研制保健型酸奶-搅拌型枸杞酸奶.

sentences.en: They were joined together in holy matrimony .
sentences.cn: 他们通过神圣的婚姻结合在一起。

sentences.en: They will soon be joined in matrimony.
When the blind lead the blind, they both fall into matrimony.
sentences.cn: 瞎子带着瞎子, 一起掉进——婚姻里.

words.tran_cn: 婚姻的；与婚姻有关的；根据结婚的惯例的
